name: bone-club
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.
